Package persistence

Class LeagueSQLDAO

java.lang.Object
persistence.LeagueSQLDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
LeagueDAO
public class LeagueSQLDAO extends Object implements LeagueDAO
The LeagueSQLDAO class is responsible for performing CRUD operations for League objects in a SQL database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LeagueSQLDAO()
    Constructs a LeagueSQLDAO object and establishes a connection to the database.
